entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
